HediffDef.label: minor anti-durability aura
HediffDef.description: This super has weaponized the suppression their superhero gene suffers from to inflict a small part of their burden upon everyone in a small area around them. The aura will affect all pawns, regardless of the genes they have, though pawns with unsuper and antisuper versions of this ability are less likely to care about the effects. The burden of this ability will render the super unconscious for 12 hours.

HediffDef.label: minor anti-super aura
HediffDef.description: A nearby anti-super is weaponizing their nature to make everyone around them weaker.

HediffDef.label: major anti-durability aura
HediffDef.description: This super has weaponized the suppression their superhero gene suffers from to inflict their burden upon everyone in a large area around them. The aura will affect all pawns, regardless of the genes they have, though pawns with unsuper and antisuper versions of this ability are less likely to care about the effects. The burden of this ability will render the super unconscious after several hours, though their aura will stick around for around 10 days.

HediffDef.label: major anti-super aura
HediffDef.description: A nearby anti-super is weaponizing their nature to make everyone around them weaker.
